name: GSY Content Filter
author: Georgi Yankov

sections.description:
The plugin allows you to temporarily or permanently filter certain words from the
title, content, excerpt or tags in posts.

You can choose where to search exactly or select everywhere in the posts. The
original content of posts is kept safe. You can always go back and show the
original text.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the gsy-content-filter directory (including all files within) to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Settings are available in Settings > GSY Content Filter
  4. The plugin is internationalized and localized for both English and Bulgarian
sections.faq:
How many filters I can create?

Up to 20.

Is there a real dangerous original text to be changed?

No, there is no any dangerous. All words replacements can be rolled back as
there is no a replacement rather just filtering or say temporarily replacement.
